metadata.title: molecules Synthesis and Evaluation of Non-peptidic Cysteine Protease Inhibitors of P. falciparum Derived from Etacrynic Acid

abstract.original_text: A series of etacrynic acid derivatives was synthesized and screened for their in vitro activity against Plasmodium falciparum, as well as their activity against recombinantly expressed falcipain-2 and -3. The two most active compounds of the series displayed IC 50 values of 9.0 and 18.8 μM against Plasmodia.

sentences.segment_text: A series of etacrynic acid derivatives was synthesized and screened for their in vitro activity against Plasmodium falciparum ,
as well as their activity against recombinantly expressed falcipain-2 and -3 .
The two most active compounds of the series displayed IC 50 values of 9.0 and 18.8 μM against Plasmodia .
